metadata.title: Pirate Ambush
metadata.description: Pirates intercept your ship while traveling through dangerous space
metadata.author: system

scenario.title: Hostile Contact!
scenario.description: Warning klaxons blare as your sensors detect multiple ships closing fast. Their transponders are masked - pirates! They're moving to intercept!
scenario.systemMessage: [ALERT] Multiple hostile contacts detected! Distance: 50,000km and closing. Weapons systems: ARMED. Recommend evasive action!

outcomes.narrative: Your superior piloting turns the tide! The pirate ships explode one by one. You salvage their wreckage for valuable components.
After a brutal exchange, the remaining pirates retreat. Your ship is damaged but you survived.
They're too strong! Your shields fail and your hull takes critical damage. You surrender before they destroy you completely.
You push your engines to maximum and execute a series of evasive maneuvers. The pirates can't keep up - you're free!
They cut off your escape! You take heavy fire as you desperately maneuver. You eventually break free but your ship is badly damaged.
You power down weapons and transfer credits to their ship. The pirates take your payment and leave without further violence.

metadata.title: Independent Trader
metadata.description: A friendly trader ship hails you with offers of trade
metadata.author: system

scenario.title: Trader Hail
scenario.description: A well-maintained merchant vessel approaches on a parallel course. They're broadcasting a friendly greeting and trade offers.
scenario.systemMessage: [HAIL RECEIVED] Greetings, traveler! Captain Zheng here. Interested in some honest trade? I've got goods from three sectors over!

outcomes.narrative: You dock with the trader's ship and browse their inventory. They have a interesting selection of goods.
The trader shares rumors of a derelict freighter spotted in the next system. Could be valuable salvage if you can find it!
They mention that pirates have been active in nearby systems. Best to avoid high-wake travel for now.
The trader mentions they're looking for someone to transport sensitive cargo to a nearby station. They'll pay well for discretion.
You thank them for the offer but continue on your way. The trader wishes you safe travels.

metadata.title: Radiation Storm
metadata.description: A dangerous surge of galactic radiation sweeps through your location
metadata.author: system

scenario.title: Radiation Spike!
scenario.description: Your radiation alarms scream as a massive surge of galactic energy sweeps toward your ship. You have seconds to react!
scenario.systemMessage: [RADIATION WARNING] Extreme surge detected! Exposure level: CRITICAL. Hull integrity at risk!

branches.label: Divert all power to radiation shielding

challenge.description: Manage power systems to minimize radiation damage

outcomes.narrative: Your quick thinking pays off! The shields hold against the radiation surge. Your ship weathers the storm with only minor system strain.
The surge overwhelms your shields! Radiation penetrates your hull, damaging sensitive electronics and exposing the crew to dangerous levels.

branches.label: Brace for impact and ride it out

outcomes.narrative: The radiation storm batters your ship. Hull plating absorbs most of it, but several systems are fried by the intense energy.

metadata.title: Derelict Ship Discovery
metadata.description: Your sensors detect a derelict vessel drifting nearby
metadata.author: system

scenario.title: Derelict Detected
scenario.description: Your passive sensors pick up a faint metallic signature. It's a ship, adrift with no power. Life support appears offline.
scenario.systemMessage: [PASSIVE SCAN] Derelict vessel detected. Classification: Transport. Age: Unknown. Life signs: Negative.

challenge.description: Search the derelict for salvage and clues

outcomes.narrative: The cargo hold contains intact containers of valuable goods! Whatever happened here, they left in a hurry.
You find some useful components and spare parts, but nothing extraordinary. The ship's logs are corrupted.
As you search the ship, automated defense systems activate! You're forced to flee as security drones attack!
You find the ship's black box. The final log entry is disturbing: 'They found us. They're not human. They're...' The recording cuts off.

branches.label: Mark its location and continue on

outcomes.narrative: You log the coordinates for potential salvage later and continue your journey.
